name: politico
text:
Joe Biden's campaign won’t comment on potential VP picks. But after word leaked that Susan Rice is being vetted, buzz about the possibility has grown.

Now rivals for the VP nod are growing nervous that Rice has a powerful edge – her close ties to Biden
https://t.co/ofrwTmepoF

name: politico
text:
Harris’ selection would disappoint some progressives, who spent much of last year criticizing her record as a prosecutor

https://t.co/KXfpa09CmS

name: politico
text: Susan Rice has unmatched foreign policy experience among the VP contenders, having served in diplomatic and national security roles in two Democratic presidential administrations https://t.co/warhIs2r9L https://t.co/EGVmmZ57QG

name: politico
text:
Rice has advised campaigns, but she doesn’t have experience as a candidate, which would be rare

https://t.co/otWZpLVkUf

name: politico
text:
The Commerce Department petitioned the FCC today to narrow the liability protections of online companies, as President Trump directed in May in what he pitched as a crackdown on anti-conservative bias

https://t.co/BRLzzjIvkm

name: politico
text:
There’s been a lot of attention on how the pandemic has altered the 2020 race. The conventions will be mostly virtual. The debates will be different, too.

But the ongoing crisis has also changed the calculus for Joe Biden’s next decision: his running mate https://t.co/nOXrIfTxES

name: politico
text: Plenty of Biden's VP contenders are fine or even good. But all of them come with a “but” attached. “There is no one ideal home run choice,” one adviser says. https://t.co/VFHv8fyNwj

name: politico
text:
AG William Barr’s long awaited testimony to the House Judiciary Committee arrives Tuesday.

Committee Democrats say they intend to distill their list of urgent issues down to one theme: that Barr has reoriented DOJ to serve Trump, rather than the nation
https://t.co/VTlUB3xeL9

name: politico
text:
Senate Republicans’ coronavirus relief package, released this evening, sets up new battles over health care funding as the coronavirus continues to overwhelm the country

https://t.co/I8q3QUZz93

name: politico
text: What's the cost of going fully online this fall to protect a vulnerable population of students? Morehouse, Spelman and Clark Atlanta each stand to lose at least $20M in revenue. https://t.co/sfD3DmfCA6

name: politico
text:
Mitch McConnell warns that businesses need protection against “an epidemic of lawsuits” that will arise as workers and customers sue employers over exposure to Covid-19

https://t.co/0OG0mzyhZA

name: politico
text:
With Republicans divided on coronavirus relief, Mitch McConnell has less leverage to negotiate with Democrats

https://t.co/xH6BkY8Ze6

name: politico
text:
How should the U.S. and its allies address mounting challenges with China? Read the latest edition of China Watcher to see what policy ideas experts propose for the global community to push back against Beijing. Sign up now.
https://t.co/3gr9jzzrQ4 https://t.co/8MoTkDib01

name: politico
text: Two days before Mike Pompeo makes a long-awaited appearance on Capitol Hill, Senate Democrats plan to release a report that is highly critical of his management of the State Department https://t.co/KFgUHHmwvb

name: politico
text: Radicalism is only one half of John Lewis’ legacy. The other half is how he took his radicalism inside the establishment, forever changing the character of the Democratic Party https://t.co/2ub7j6efN9

name: politico
text: The CEOs of Amazon, Google, Apple and Facebook will testify before House lawmakers Wednesday on allegations their companies are harming consumers by unfairly stifling the competition https://t.co/KBnpCMPNhA

name: politico
text:
For as well as Trump performed with white working class voters in 2016, he needs to do even better with them in 2020 to win the election. 

The question is: Can he?
https://t.co/nV40fFubfa

name: politico
text: Senate Republicans finally rolled out their offer for another coronavirus stimulus bill, which is significantly less generous than the House Democrats’ version, especially on expanded unemployment insurance https://t.co/Oq49fN85A5

name: politico
text: Trump’s muted reaction to the death of a historic figure — albeit one with whom he disagreed — is just the latest instance of how he struggles to respond as a typical president would in these situations https://t.co/d3wvqyL1KW
